title: 129. Retrofitting Coca-Cola's Freestyle Machines for Touchless Interaction
description: In this episode of The Barron Report, host Paul Barron sits down with Chris Hellmann, the global vice president and general manager of Coca-Cola’s Freestyle Division. Barron and Hellmann discuss the latest Coca-Cola Freestyle innovation: a contactless sales solution that allows customers to select and pour a drink in a matter of seconds by using their phone.
itunes:author: Foodable Network
